items.sentence: I haven't talked to Tom in a really long time.
I got to know Tom when I was living in Boston.
I don't want Tom to know how rich I really am.
I didn't want Tom to think anything was wrong.
As soon as Tom got home, he went right to bed.
A documentary has been made about Tom Jackson.
Tom spends about three hundred dollars a week.
Tom said that he had a good time in Australia.
Tom rode a horse for the first time yesterday.
Tom needs to stay here until tomorrow morning.
